entry.title: Where to have discussions...
entry.summary: Michael Gr√∏nager, a member of the bitcoin community, expressed his desire for discussions and conclusions to take place in one centralized location instead of scattered across multiple platforms such as bitcointalk or BIP notes. Gavin Andresen, another member, shared his efforts to move conversations onto the bitcoin-dev mailing list by starting discussions there and posting links to the archives in other forums. While Andresen acknowledges that IRC conversations are great for brainstorming, he hopes that once consensus is reached through IRC, issues will migrate to the mailing list for further discussion.
